DOC.brief_summary: The current observational program was determined to collect data on the real life dosing regimen of Remicade in patients with Crohn's disease (CD) in the hospital and non-hospital setting.
DOC.brief_title: Program Extension of Real Life Dosing of Remicade in Austria for Crohn's Disease (Study P04052)(COMPLETED)
DOC.detailed_description: This study population was chosen from a non-probability sample
DOC.criteria: Subjects with active luminal and/or fistulizing CD. Per summary of product characteristics.
